Package com.trading.application.portfolio.controller

Class PortfolioController

java.lang.Object
com.trading.application.portfolio.controller.PortfolioController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/portfolio") @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:8080") public class PortfolioController extends Object
Portfolio Controller class for handling portfolio-related HTTP requests.

  • Method Details

    • createPortfolio

      @PostMapping @RequestMapping("/create") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createPortfolio(@RequestBody Portfolio portfolio, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Create portfolio response entity.
      Parameters:
      portfolio - the portfolio for which to be created.
      request - the request to retrieve the IP address of the client that makes the HTTP request.
      Returns:
      a `ResponseEntity` containing a `String` response indicating the result of the portfolio creation operation.

    • getPortfolio

      @GetMapping @RequestMapping("/{portfolioId}") public Portfolio getPortfolio(@PathVariable String portfolioId) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Gets portfolio by portfolio id
      Parameters:
      portfolioId - the portfolio id of the portfolio to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      the portfolio object representing the portfolio with the given portfolioId.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during execution.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted.

    • deletePortfolio

      @DeleteMapping @RequestMapping("/delete/{portfolioId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deletePortfolio(@PathVariable String portfolioId)
      Delete portfolio by portfolio id.
      Parameters:
      portfolioId - the portfolio id of the portfolio to be deleted.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a message indicating the result of the deletion operation. * - HttpStatus.OK (200) if the portfolio was successfully deleted. * - HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND (404) if the portfolio with the given portfolioId was not found. * - HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR (500) if an error occurred during the deletion.

    • updatePortfolio

      @PutMapping @RequestMapping("/updateportfolio") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updatePortfolio(@RequestBody Portfolio portfolio, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Update portfolio based on request body.
      Parameters:
      portfolio - The Portfolio object containing the updated information for the portfolio.
      request - the request to retrieve the IP address of the client that makes the HTTP request.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a message indicating the result of the deletion operation. * - HttpStatus.OK (200) if the portfolio was successfully deleted. * - HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND (404) if the portfolio with the given portfolioId was not found. * - HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR (500) if an error occurred during the deletion.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during execution.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted.

    • getAllPortfolios

      @GetMapping @RequestMapping("/getportfolios/{userId}") public List<Portfolio> getAllPortfolios(@PathVariable String userId) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Gets all portfolios of a user by user id.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id of the user for whom the portfolios are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      a List of Portfolio objects representing the portfolios associated with the user.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during execution.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted.

    • getSectorsByPortfolioId

      @GetMapping @RequestMapping("/getsectorsbyportfolio/{portfolioId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Integer>> getSectorsByPortfolioId(@PathVariable String portfolioId) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Gets sectors by portfolio id.
      Parameters:
      portfolioId - the portfolio id of the portfolio for which sector information is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a map of sector names and counts if found. - HttpStatus.OK (200) if the data was successfully retrieved. - HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND (404) if the portfolio with the given portfolioId was not found.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during execution.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted.

    • getSectorsByUserId

      @GetMapping @RequestMapping("/getsectorsbyuser/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Integer>> getSectorsByUserId(@PathVariable String userId) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Gets sectors by user id.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id of the user for whom sector information is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a map of sector names and counts if found. - HttpStatus.OK (200) if the data was successfully retrieved. - HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND (404) if no data was found for the specified user.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during execution.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted.

    • getAllPublicPortfolios

      @GetMapping @RequestMapping("/getpublicportfolios") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ArrayList<Portfolio>> getAllPublicPortfolios() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Gets all public portfolios.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a list of public portfolios. - HttpStatus.OK (200) if the public portfolios were successfully retrieved.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during execution.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted.
